attributes.action: Leave the EU on WTO terms
attributes.additional_details:
Only with WTO can we achieve what Brexit means to be fully out of the EU 

Sign the link and vote WTO its the only way to go.

We need all the MP’s both Conservative and Labour to carry out the mandates they both gave in the last election, to carry out the will of the people in the 2016 referendum and fully leave the EU
attributes.background: Now May’s EU deal has been voted against we need to advance to the next stage and leave the EU on 29th March 2019
